semantics.label: Tekst opisa rezultata
semantics.default: Ispravan odgovor daje +1 bod. Pogrešan odgovor daje -1 bod. Najmanji mogući rezultat je 0.

fields.label: Naziv ovog pitanja
fields.description: Koristi se u sažecima, statistikama, itd..

fields.label: Pokaži naziv
fields.description: Isključi ovu opciju ako ne želiš vidjeti naslov.Naslov će biti prikazan samo u sažecima, statistikama, itd.

fields.label: Slika pozadine
fields.description: Opcionalno. Odaberi neku sliku koja će služiti kao pozadina za zadatak 'Uzmi i spusti'.

fields.label: Dimenzije zadatka
fields.description: Odredi koliko veliki prostor (u pixelima) treba biti

fields.label: Zadatak
fields.description:
Počni sa određivanjem zona za spustanje.
Zatim, postavi elemente za spustanje i provjeri odgovarajuće zone za spustanje.
Na kraju, uredi ponovo zonu i provjeri tačne odgovore.
Odaberi vrstu sadržaja koju želiš dodati.

fields.label: Neograničen broj elemenata
fields.description: Klonira ovaj element kako bi mogao biti spušten na višestruke zone.

fields.label: Message displayed on correct match
fields.description: Message will appear below the task on "check" if correct droppable is matched.

fields.label: Message displayed on incorrect match
fields.description: Message will appear below the task on "check" if the match is incorrect.

fields.label: Ova zona za spustanje može sadržavati samo jedan element
fields.description: Budi siguran da ima samo jedan tačan odgovor za ovu zonu za spustanje

fields.label: Omogući automatsko poravnanje
fields.description: Automatsko poravnanje za sve u ovoj zoni.

semantics.label: Pozadinska zamućenost za elemente za uzimanje

fields.label: Define custom feedback for any score range
fields.description:
Example: 0-20% Bad score, 21-91% Average Score, 91-100% Great Score!
Available variables: @score and @total. Example: 'You got @score of @total possible points'

semantics.label: Behavioural settings
semantics.description: These options will let you control how the task behaves.

fields.label: Require user input before the solution can be viewed
Give one point for the whole task
fields.description: Disable to give one point for each draggable that is placed correctly.

fields.label: Apply penalties
fields.description: Apply penalties for elements dropped in the wrong drop zones. This must be enabled when the same element(s) are able to be dropped into multiple drop zones, or if there is only one drop-zone. If this is not enabled, learners may match all items to all drop-zones and always receive a full score.

fields.label: Enable score explanation
fields.description: Display a score explanation to user when checking their answers (if the 'Apply penalties' option has been selected).

fields.label: Background opacity for draggables
fields.description: If this field is set, it will override opacity set on all draggable elements. This should be a number between 0 and 100, where 0 means full transparency and 100 means no transparency

fields.label: Drop Zone Highlighting
fields.description: Choose when to highlight drop zones.

fields.label: Enable FullScreen
fields.description: Check this option to enable the full screen button.

fields.label: Show score points
fields.description: Show points earned for each answer. Not available when the 'Give one point for the whole task' option is enabled.

fields.label: Daje jedan bod za cijeli zadatak

semantics.label: Header for panel containing feedback for correct/incorrect answers
